description: MIDWEEK MASTERPIECE A tasty and fresh burrito hits the spot on any day. Thanks to the Old El Paso Burrito Kit, you have what you need to make your own in a flash! Taco Tuesday canâ€™t come around soon enough.
keywords: Burrito,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Burritos With Charred Corn Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 485g Old El Paso Burrito the Kit
4 pkt corn cobs, husks & silks discarded
1 pkt small red onion, finely chopped
0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped
1 pkt lime, juiced, plus 1 cut into quarters, to serve
0.5 pkt green oak leaf lettuce, leaves separated
1 pkt avocado, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, burrito spice mix from the kit and 1 tbs oil in a large bowl and toss to coat. Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken, for 10 minutes turning, or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Spray a large grill pan with oil and heat over high heat. Grill corn for 15 minutes, turning, or until charred and tender. Cut kernels from cob, then discard cob. Place kernels, onion, coriander and lime juice in a medium bowl and stir to combine.
Heat tortillas from the kit according to packet instructions.
Divide lettuce, chicken, corn salsa, avocado and a little burrito salsa from the kit among tortillas. Roll to enclose filling. Serve with remaining burrito salsa and lime wedges.
